TEI.2.document_title: William S Parrott to Stephen F Austin, 596

barker_notes.barker_summary: William S. Parrott to Austin, Mexico, February 9, 1831. Forwarding a letter, and asking Austin's assistance concerning a land grant for the widow Ross. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 596
